abi: function add(string memory _cid, string memory _tag) public
function addBatch((string cid, string tag) memory _headers) public
function get(uint256 _id) public view returns ((uint256 id, uint256 timestamp, address author, bool locked, string tag, string cid) memory)
function getBatch(uint256 _batchId) public view returns ((uint256 id, uint256 timestamp, address author, bool locked, string tag, string cid)[] memory)
